video_prompt: Pan right across a miniature refrigerator. Multiple New York City-themed magnets (Statue of Liberty, Empire State Building, taxi, pizza, pinecones, "MARPINS" sign, "New York NYC" text, Christmas trees) actively *wiggle and shift positions*. The background *blurs and sharpens*, revealing hints of green and brown from an outdoor setting. Pinecones scattered around the base *roll subtly*. Slight camera movement *explores* the "c29" signature. metallic handles *reflect changing light*. subtly *pans around* the refrigerator.
image_prompt: A cream-colored, eye-level miniature refrigerator adorned with numerous New York City themed magnets, including the Statue of Liberty, Empire State Building, a taxi, "MARPINS" sign, and "New York NYC" text. Scattered pinecones surround its base on a stone surface, with a softly blurred outdoor background. A "c29" signature is on the bottom right.
refined_video_prompt: A rightward pan begins, showing themed magnets actively *wiggling and shifting positions* on a surface. Concurrently, the background *blurs and sharpens*, dynamically revealing greens and browns of an outdoor setting. Objects scattered at the base *roll subtly*. The camera then subtly *explores* a specific detail, while metallic elements *reflect changing light*. The scene concludes with a gentle *pan around* the main form, emphasizing constant motion and environmental shifts.
